StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [M8412_Get_Person_Background_Info]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID INT = 0, @User_Org INT AS SET NOCOUNT ON DECLARE @ReadOnly As Int DECLARE @PersonOrgID As Int
SET @PersonOrgID = (SELECT LOCATION_ID FROM M8412_Recruit_Person WHERE PERSON_ID = @PersonID) IF @PersonOrgID IS NULL BEGIN SET @PersonOrgID = (SELECT ORGANIZATION_ID FROM RECRUITING_PERSON WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = @PersonID) END
IF @PersonOrgID IN (SELECT ORG_ID FROM DBO.GetChildOrgsRecursive(@User_Org)) OR @User_Org = 900 SET @ReadOnly = 0 ELSE SET @ReadOnly = 1
SELECT 'XXXXX' + RIGHT(p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER,4) Masked_SSN , SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER , p.FIRST_NAME , p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME , p.LAST_NAME , p.LAST_NAME + ', ' + p.FIRST_NAME + ' ' + p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME PersonName , p.SUFFIX_CD , Rank_ID , (select Rank_Code from M8412_Lk_Rank where Rank_ID= r.Rank_ID) Rank_code , r.Loca.on_ID , r.Billet , (select Billet_ID from M8412_Lk_Billet where Billet= r.Billet) Billet_ID , le.(convert(varchar,r.Date_Billet,102),4) + substring(convert(varchar,r.Date_Billet,102),6,2) + right(convert(varchar,r.Date_Billet,102),2)Date_Billet , le.(convert(varchar,r.Date_Rank,102),4) + substring(convert(varchar,r.Date_Rank,102),6,2) + right(convert(varchar,r.Date_Rank,102),2)Date_Rank , le.(convert(varchar,r.Date_AFADBD,102),4) + substring(convert(varchar,r.Date_AFADBD,102),6,2) + right(convert(varchar,r.Date_AFADBD,102),2) Date_AFADBD , r.Current_Loca.on , r.Phone_No , le.(convert(varchar,r.Date_8412I,102),4) + substring(convert(varchar,r.Date_8412I,102),6,2) + right(convert(varchar,r.Date_8412I,102),2) Date_8412I , le.(convert(varchar,r.Date_8412,102),4) + substring(convert(varchar,r.Date_8412,102),6,2) + right(convert(varchar,r.Date_8412,102),2) Date_8412 , le.(convert(varchar,r.Date_Curr_Tour_Began,102),4) + substring(convert(varchar,r.Date_Curr_Tour_Began,102),6,2) + right(convert(varchar,r.Date_Curr_Tour_Began,102),2) Date_Curr_Tour_Began , le.(convert(varchar,r.Date_Last_PCS,102),4) + substring(convert(varchar,r.Date_Last_PCS,102),6,2) + right(convert(varchar,r.Date_Last_PCS,102),2) Date_Last_PCS , le.(convert(varchar,r.Date_Re.re,102),4) + substring(convert(varchar,r.Date_Re.re,102),6,2) + right(convert(varchar,r.Date_Re.re,102),2) Date_Re.re , le.(convert(varchar,r.Date_Void,102),4) + substring(convert(varchar,r.Date_Void,102),6,2) + right(convert(varchar,r.Date_Void,102),2) Date_Void , le.(convert(varchar,r.Modi.ed_Date,120),4) + substring(convert(varchar,r.Modi.ed_Date,120),6,2) + substring(convert(varchar,r.Modi.ed_Date,120),9,2) + ' ' + substring(convert(varchar,r.Modi.ed_Date,120),12,5) Modi.ed_Date, @ReadOnly AS READ_ONLY FROM M8412_Person_View p LEFT OUTER JOIN M8412_Recruit_Person r ON p.Person_ID=r.Person_ID WHERE p.PERSON_ID = @PersonID
SET NOCOUNT OFF
